ContentType.name: RegisteredUser
ContentType.Description: This content type is used to store information for users registered through a form. It has extra fields and functionality compared to a simple User, such as activation through e-mail, security question and answer, etc.

Configuration.MailDefinition:
Click the following link to activate your account:
##ActivationLink##

Field.name: ResetKey
Field.Description: Reset key guid used by the reset password link.

Field.name: ActivationId
Field.Description: Activation guid used by the registered user activation links.

Field.name: Activated
Field.Description: User is activated by the activation email. (or you can activate user by enabling this option).

Field.name: SecurityQuestion
Field.Description: Password recovery information entered by the user.

Field.name: SecurityAnswer
Field.Description: Password recovery answer to the end user's question.
